title: Is it permissible to pray in coats & Jackets? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: taymur from the uk uh is uh wearing coats and jackets during prayer wearing what and what sun jackets yes is that acceptable during prayer okay okay i will answer inshallah taymur from the uk says is it permissible to pray wearing a jacket the answer is yes there's nothing wrong in that for a man to wear a jacket or a pullover or whatever uh uh on himself that's th this does not impact his prayer
